text:
[Verse]
Morning light shines through
Chased away the gray
Dancing in the dew
Feel the brand new day

[Verse 2]
Laughing by the stream
Whispering the breeze
Living out our dream
Underneath the trees

[Chorus]
Sunshine through the rain
Colors in our eyes
Washing off the pain
Reaching for the skies

[Verse 3]
Footsteps in the sand
Waves upon the shore
Holding to your hand
Promise us there's more

[Chorus]
Sunshine through the rain
Colors in our eyes
Washing off the pain
Reaching for the skies

[Bridge]
Even when it's dark
Feel the world alive
Listen to the spark
Life will always thrive
title: Sunshine Through the Rain
